job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: At HubSpot we use data to power our decisions systems and product solutions Were seeking an experienced data scientist to deliver that insight Our ideal team member will have the mathematical and statistical expertise youd expect but a natural curiosity and creative mind thats not so easy to find You will join a team of data specialists but will slice and dice data using your own methods creating new visions for the futurebrbrstrongObjectives of this RolebrstrongulliCollaborate with product design and engineering to develop an understanding of needsliliResearch and devise innovative statistical models for data analysisliliEnable smarter business processesand implement analytics for meaningful insightsliliKeep current with technical and industry developmentsbrliulstronguRole ObjectivesResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliWork as the lead data strategist building models to improve internal efficiency and customer experienceliliWork closely with the engineering team to strategize and execute the development of data productsliliExecute analytical experiments methodically to help solve various problems and make a true impact across various domains and industriesliliImplement analytical models into production by collaborating with software developers and machine learning engineersliliDevise and utilize algorithms and models to mine big data stores perform data and error analysis to improve models and clean and validate data for uniformity and accuracyliliIdentify relevant data sources and sets to mine for client business needs and collect large structured and unstructured datasets and variablesliliAnalyze data for trends and patterns and Interpret data with a clear objective in mindliliCommunicate analytic solutions to stakeholders and implement improvements as needed to operational systemsbrliulstronguSkills And QualificationsbrustrongulliDegree in statistics applied mathematics or related disciplinelili5 years experience in data scienceliliProficiency with data mining mathematics and statistical analysisliliAdvanced pattern recognition and predictive modeling experienceliliAdvanced use of SQL R PythonliliExperience with machine learning modelsliliComfort working in a dynamic researchoriented group with several ongoing concurrent projectsbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliMasters degree in stats applied math or related disciplinelili2 years of project management experienceliliProfessional certificationsbrliulemWe know theemem confidence gapemem andemem imposter syndromeemem can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates so please dont hesitate to apply  wed love to hear from youbrbremstronguAbout HubSpotbrbrustrongHubSpot NYSE HUBS is a leading customer relationship management CRM platform that provides software and support to help businesses grow better We build marketing sales service and website management products that start free and scale to meet our customers needs at any stage of growth Were also building a company culture that empowers people to do their best work If that sounds like something youd like to be
